body:
Successfully builds and passes all tests on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.8.9 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

GDAL 3.3 makes a lot of big changes, including dropping Python 2 support, renaming `osgeo.utils` to `osgeo_utils`, and deprecating/removing several drivers:
https://github.com/OSGeo/gdal/releases/tag/v3.3.0
title: GDAL: add v3.3.0
